code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{ContactContainer,ContactH1,Img,Icon}from'./ContactElements';import{Col}from'reactstrap';import'../Contact/Contact.css';import img from"../images/CONTACT.svg";import*as emailjs from'emailjs-com';var Contact=function Contact(){function sendEmail(e){e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('YOUR_SERVICE_ID','YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID',e.target,'YOUR_USER_ID').then(function(result){console.log(result.text);},function(error){console.log(error.text);});}function submit(){alert("메일을 보냈습니다.");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ContactContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactH1,{children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Img,{src:img}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:{size:4,offset:4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"contact-form",onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"from_name",placeholder:"NAME"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"from_email",placeholder:"EMAIL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",placeholder:"MESSAGE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Send",onClick:submit})]})})]});};export default Contact;
